attributes.action: correct an incorrect statement that he made to Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During his Lisbon Summit Statement he stated that 62% of our exports go to the EU – probably true.   That three million jobs depend on those exports – probably true.   That (word for word) “Millions of jobs are dependant on our membership of the EU”.   This is incorrect.   He forgets to mention that they export more to us than we do to them.   It is inconceivable that Mercedes, BMW, Volkswagon, Bosch, Fiat, Renault, etc. and companies producing white goods, food, wines, clothing, etc. would stop trading with us.   They need our market.   The EU would not place restrictions on our goods knowing that they would face the same.   Free trade would continue as a necessity.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
